info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otero, northeastern Huerfano, north central Las Animas, western Crowley and eastern Pueblo Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 432 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blende, or 10 miles southeast of Pueblo, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Pueblo, Boone, Avondale, Pueblo Depot, Salt Creek and Blende. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
